properties.name: management.endpoint.health.probes.add-additional-paths
properties.description: Whether to make the liveness and readiness health groups available on the main server port.

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.probes.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness and readiness probes.

properties.name: management.endpoint.health.validate-group-membership
properties.description: Whether to validate health group membership on startup. Validation fails if a group includes or excludes a health contributor that does not exist.

properties.name: management.health.defaults.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable default health indicators.

properties.name: management.health.diskspace.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable disk space health check.

properties.name: management.health.livenessstate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness state health check.

properties.name: management.health.ping.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable ping health check.

properties.name: management.health.probes.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable liveness and readiness probes.

properties.name: management.health.readinessstate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable readiness state health check.

properties.name: management.health.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL certificate health check.
